text:
@bbclaurak FFS. Haven't we got past this stage? Has he got Civil Servants stalking bars and cafes counting the visitors or is he talking out his ass?

Why doesn't he just go the whole hog and tweet "Let's Get Covid19 Done!" with a double thumbs up picture while hiding in a fridge?
